creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: abstracted nest: dark brown outer ring around interior layers of tan and lavender with overlapping yellow and green forms; burgundy leaf like form at LR of nest interior; vertical brown form on R of nest
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Marks LLC, in pencil: [Nest R/ Rikio Takahashi]; LRC, in
title: Nest R.
